health_sector_discussed_people_names: Hon. Joel Karuri,Hon. Anthony Rotich,Hon. Wilson Wachira,Hon. Karanja,Hon. Virginia Wamaitha
health_data_information_systems_summary: Discussions included the budget allocation for the Department of Health, challenges in equipping health facilities, and the importance of proper planning in the health sector.
health_data_challenges: Underperforming local revenue collection, lack of equipment in health facilities, unrealistic targets for development projects
health_service_delivery_improvement_reco: Equip health facilities, set realistic targets for development projects, enhance revenue collection mechanisms
